episodes.title: Escaping a Cult, Embracing Faith : Christiana’s Story of Survival and Strength | Ep.22
episodes.description: What happens when your whole world collapses — and you have to rebuild it while pregnant with triplets? 💔 In this powerful, faith-filled episode, Kaylee Berlinee sits down with Christiana Cook, a mother of five whose story is both heartbreaking and breathtaking. After escaping a religious cult and surviving the collapse of her marriage to a former NFL player, Christiana found herself raising five children alone — and relying on faith and family to rebuild from the ground up. ✨ You’ll hear: The moment she realized she had to walk away — and the price of freedom What faith looked like when everything else failed The truth about trauma recovery, single motherhood, and grace How she found purpose again through education and faith in God’s timing This episode is a masterclass in courage — reminding every mom that no matter what’s been taken from you, God can still restore everything. Reflection Question: Where in your life is God asking you to trust His timing instead of your plan?
